All Classes

Class Summary 
Class Description
Battle
This is essentially the "battlefield" for the player for whenever they have to face an enemy The perspective is now to the side, gravity is in place allowing the player to jump and they have to try defeat the enemy before they defeat the player The player attacks by shooting bullets at the enemy and the enemy attacks by mainly throwing knives at the player or touching the player
BattleRules
This class is for establishing the fact that when the enemy touches the player in the battle world, the player takes damage.
BattleStart
This class is for a battle being initiated between an enemy and the layer
BulletRules
This class is for what happens when a bullet from the player collides with the enemy
Character
A simple character class for every character in the over world levels.
CharacterBattle
A class for the statistics of every character, enemies and the player's stats is in another class but is an extension of this class.
ControllerBattle
The controls for the player in the battle world.
ControllerOverWorld
The controls for the player in the over world levels.
ControlPanel
This class is for the GUI at the bottom of the screen.
EnemyAttackRules
This class establishes what happens when a knife from the enemy collides with the player
Exit
A simple class creating the box shape and image of the exits of every level.
ExitListener
This class establishes what happens when the player collides with the exit
Game
This class is essentially where the entire environment of the game is as it holds and has access to most of the very important variables and other classes.
GameLevel
The game will be designed in a way for the player to have to traverse through paths and fight their way to the end.
GameLoader
The class for loading a save file into the game to allow the player to continue from their saved progress
GameSaver
A class to allow the user to save all their current progress, including all their stats, the level they are in, their position in the level and the number of enemies they have defeated in that level.
Level1
The class for the first level of the game.
Level2
The class for the second level of the game.
Level3
The class for the third level of the game.
Level4
The class for the fourth level of the game.
Level5
The class for the final level of the game.
Player
The class for the body of the player in the over world levels
PlayerBattle
An extension of the CharacterBattle class, this class is exclusive to the player as only the player is capable of earning exp and leveling up.
PolygonEditor
Very basic polygon editor.
StatsView
This class is for the view of all the worlds and levels and allows the user to see their health and attack stats.
